TutorialItemList.Description: Tap on a square on the lighter part of suitcase.
You failed. Let's try again. Tap on a square to place your object.
You succeeded. Let's go on!
Let's go on!

Welcome Captain!
You can swipe to view the high seas! Let's find a ship, arrows will guide you.

You can connect to a ship's control system by typing it's morse code
Holding the morse button types a dash, clicking types a dot. Try it yourself!
You can maneuver with the joystick.
You can hold the boost lever to increase the speed.
Your goal is to help ships reach their target which is indicated with a lighthouse icon.
Now, control the ship between the yellow lines.
Perfect. Good luck!
You can control the rabbit using the buttons below.
Your target is to reach to carrot.
But you have a rival! So don't let the turtle pass you.
The maze can rotate, but the buttons won't. Use the pointer to orient yourself correctly.
Your goal is to visit touristic cities with the cheapest way possible with your camper.  Select a city and let's start!
Every tile on the map has a cost which is indicated by it's color. Keep their values in mind.
If you forget them, you can look back at them anytime from the button. However, you will lose some points.
After you take a peek, you can close the panel by clicking the same button.
Now you can drive your camper with the controller below. Good Luck!
In this game, you are a bus driver.
Every passenger has an icon that shows which stop they will get off.
Remember passengers' desired destination and answer the questions accordingly. Good Luck!
